Translations.Text: Feng zhiren zhi ci de zhenzhu zhi ming
yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu, quan shijie de zhu
Women zhi chongbai ni, zhi qiu ni youzhu
qiu ni yindao women shang zhenglu
ni suo youzhu zhe de lu, bushi shou qian nu zhe de lu, ye bushi mi wu zhe de lu
